author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add comprehensive test suite and improve link filtering

Tests:
- Added 340+ tests covering all major modules
- ATProto: discovery, dpop, pkce, session, tid
- Bluesky: parser
- Links: extractor, link, quality_filter, links context
- Web: controllers, LiveView
- Disabled firehose/tagger in test config for isolation

Filtering improvements:
- Added x.com/twitter.com to banned domains
- Added English-only filtering (requires en/en-* lang tag)
- Deleted 54 x.com links and 11,958 non-English links

Fixes:
- Fixed AxonTagger :skipped case clause error
- Mark skipped links as processed to prevent reprocessing
- Fixed flaky AxonTagger tests with proper isolation

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add live ingestion dashboard at /ingestion

- PubSub broadcasts for new links and tagging events
- Real-time LiveView showing incoming links from firehose
- Tagging activity panel showing ML predictions as they happen
- Stats display for posts processed, links qualified, tags applied
- Pause/resume and clear controls
- Mac OS retro styling consistent with main UI
- Navigation between Stumble and Ingestion views

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add Axon ML tagger, ATProto integration, and GitHub Pages docs

- Axon/Nx/EXLA tagger for on-device ML tagging (1700 pred/sec)
- ATProto OAuth, PDS sync, custom lexicons
- GitHub Pages site with classic Mac OS styling
- Comprehensive test suite (83 tests)
- Architecture and API documentation

author: Bobby Nathan
message: Default tagger to English-only links

message: Add detailed logging for tagged links (post, url, tags)

message: Switch Ollama client from :httpc to Req

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add language filter feature

Database:
- Migration adds langs array column with GIN index
- Link schema updated with langs field

Backend:
- Extractor captures langs from firehose posts
- Links context supports :langs filter option (array overlap)
- API controller accepts lang param from bookmarklet

UI:
- Mac-style Language dropdown in menubar
- Toggle individual languages (en, es, pt, de, fr, ja, ko, zh)
- "All Languages" option clears filter
- Status bar shows active filter

Bookmarklet:
- Detects page language via document.documentElement.lang
- Falls back to navigator.language
- Extracts base code (en-US -> en)

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add emoji filter, banned domains, and UI fixes

Filtering:
- Max 3 emojis per post (spam filter)
- Banned domains: tinyurl.com, bit.ly, t.co
- Domain check in extractor before storing

UI changes:
- Grey/white dot pattern background (authentic Mac OS)
- Wider window (95%, max 1000px)
- Swapped columns: Post | Domain (removed Score)
- Cleaned up unused score CSS

Database cleanup:
- Deleted 21 links from banned domains
- Deleted 4 emoji spam links

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Redesign UI as retro Mac OS desktop

- Classic Mac OS 9/System 7 aesthetic
- Window with titlebar, horizontal lines, close button
- Grab bag view showing 20 links at once
- Domain | Post | Score columns
- Classic Mac scrollbar styling
- Menu bar with Apple menu
- Shuffle button to get new random links
- Click any row to open link

author: Bobby Nathan
message: Cleanup: purged 166 old links not meeting new quality criteria

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Fix: text length check now excludes hashtags

Posts like '#totp' with just a hashtag and link no longer qualify.
Text length requirement (50 chars) now measured AFTER stripping hashtags.

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Refine link quality signals for higher quality links

Quality criteria:
- Author: >= 500 followers, <= 5000 following
- Account age: >= 1 year old (indexed_at)
- Bio: must be filled (non-empty description)
- Post: >= 50 chars text (no bare links)
- Post: max 1 hashtag (spam filter)
- Post: exactly 1 link (multiple links = spam)
- Replies: now allowed if meeting all criteria

Scoring updated:
- Base score from log10(followers) * 15
- Bonus for follower/following ratio (up to +20)
- Rewards curated accounts over follow-for-follow

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add bookmarklet and API endpoint

- BookmarkletLive at GET /bookmarklet with draggable bookmarklet
- POST /api/links endpoint for bookmarklet submissions
- LinkController handles create with validation
- JavaScript bookmarklet sends URL/title via fetch

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add stumble LiveView UI

- StumbleLive at GET / with Stumble! button
- Shows random link with author info, avatar, follower count
- Tracks session history to avoid showing same links
- Displays total link count and top domains
- Gradient purple/pink design with Tailwind CSS

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add link extraction and scoring

- Extractor subscribes to firehose posts via PubSub
- Filters links by author quality (>=100 followers)
- Excludes replies and Bluesky internal links
- Log-based scoring algorithm (log10(followers) * 20)
- Links context with random_link/1 for stumbling

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add links database schema

- Link Ecto schema with url, url_hash, domain, title, score
- Author metadata fields (handle, display_name, followers_count)
- Stumble count tracking
- Migration with indexes on url_hash, domain, score

author: Bobby Nathan
message:
Add Bluesky firehose integration via Graze Turbostream

- WebSocket client connecting to Turbostream (hydrated firehose)
- Parser for Turbostream events with snake_case keys
- Type definitions for Post, Author, ExternalEmbed, FacetLink
- Supervisor for firehose process
- Broadcasts posts via Phoenix PubSub
